name: Magic Progression

quests.name: Gold Leaves
quests.description: In order to start with Nature's Aura, you will need to  make some brilliant fiber, and place it in some leaves (like infesting with silk worms). This, after a while, will create some leaves that when broken will drop gold leaves.

quests.name: Celestial Altar
quests.description: The Celestial Altar is the next one you are able to do.

quests.name: Mana Generation
quests.description: A simple and common way of generating mana is to set up a dropper with some redstone and use it to drop coal for some Endoflames to use.

quests.name: Runes
quests.description: There are four levels of runes. The first level is the elemental ones. The season runes are the next level. The Sin runes are the third. The final level of runes are the nine world runes.

quests.name: Starlight Crafting Altar
quests.description: Upgrading your Luminous Crafting Table will allow you to craft more things.

quests.name: Rending Gale
quests.description: Used to make the Angel Ring, this can help you stay safe off the ground.

quests.name: Witherless Rose
quests.description: With this in your inventory those silly skeletons' touch will not bother you.

quests.name: Fancy Robes
quests.description: There are three levels of fancy robes to make.

quests.name: Offering Table
quests.description: This simple offering table will be useful to you.

quests.name: Liquid Starlight
quests.description: Collecting this slippery fluid is going to be essential in working with the stars.

quests.name: Pure Daisy
quests.description: A pure daisy is the first flower you are going to want.

quests.name: Blood Orbs
quests.description: Craft at least one of each blood orb.

quests.name: Runic Altar
quests.description: The runic altar is a basic crafting tool. One of the first things you will want to craft are some runes.

quests.name: Luminous Crafting Table
quests.description: In order to start with Astral Sorcery, you will need to find a structure (in the Lost Cities) that allows you to craft a luminous crafting table.

quests.name: Mantle of the Stars
quests.description: This fancy robe has great potential

quests.name: Ritual of the Forest
quests.description: This ritual converts the power of trees growing into handy items.

quests.name: Altar of Birthing
quests.description: The Altar of Birthing can create mobs.

quests.name: Getting Elements
quests.description: In order to get the elements in a usable form, you will need to either extract them from the element sources scattered throughout the other dimensions, or evaporate the shards. The Elementopedia will help you here.

quests.name: Starlight Infuser
quests.description: Infusing things with starlight can allow them to be used to make more refined things.

quests.name: Petal Apothecary
quests.description: In order to start into some of the early botania, you will need to weather some limestone and stonecut it into the cobble version.

quests.name: Crystallized Will
quests.description: You will want to find a way to crystallize the demon will.

quests.name: Hellfire Forge
quests.description: This is a basic crafting tool for blood magic.

quests.name: Coin of Fortune
quests.description: This works much like a magnet.

quests.name: Rituals
quests.description: There are several different rituals that can help you do many things. The constellation used will determine which ritual is done.

quests.name: Mana Manipulation
quests.description: The easiest way of moving and storing mana will be with a mana spreader and mana pool.

quests.name: Sojourner's Staff
quests.description: This handy staff can place torches far away from you. Handy in lighting up that big cave.

quests.name: Crystallizer
quests.description: This handy thing will be able to create crystal versions of the elements.

quests.name: Spell Book
quests.description: One of the first things to do in Ars Nouveau is make a spell book.

quests.name: Alfsteel
quests.description: After trading a few things with through the portal, you will want to make some Alfsteel. The process is similar to terrasteel, but with the traded versions.

quests.name: Enchanting
quests.description: The Enchanting Aparatus is used for creating a few handy things.

quests.name: Natural Altar
quests.description: The natural altar is used to convert things into a more useful form. Setting it up in the nether with resources from there, will create the crimson altar version.

quests.name: Void Tear
quests.description: This handy thing is not just used for crafting other stuff. It can hold an immense amount of items for you (much like that dank of yours)

quests.name: Portal to the Alfheim
quests.description: This portal will allow you to trade materials with those living on the other side. The Lexica Botania can explain how to set it up.

quests.name: Mana Bloom
quests.description: This fancy flower is used to create fancy robes for you to wear whilst casting your spells...

quests.name: Mob Drops
quests.description: Starting into Reliquary is quite simple. Most of the items you need will be mob drops.

quests.name: Mana Condenser
quests.description: A good way to get mana to use for your various things, you will want to use a Mana condenser and put it in a mana jar.

quests.name: Containment Chalice
quests.description: The containment chalice's possibly most useful thing is to provide liquid starlight to the infuser so you don't have to keep replacing that pesky source block that keeps disappearing.

quests.name: Tome of Alkahestry
quests.description: This handy book can duplicate some things for you. You will need to charge it up though...

quests.name: Infusing Elements
quests.description: On use of these elements is to infuse them into your armor and tools.

quests.name: Pure Infuser
quests.description: This infuser is able to create pure forms of important items.

quests.name: Glyph Press
quests.description: The Glyph Press is used to create glyphs for your spells.

quests.name: Emperor's Chalice
quests.description: This will act like a water bucket that never runs dry.

quests.name: Paranoid Lantern
quests.description: The Lantern of Paranoia will place torches from your inventory wherever you may need one to prevent those pesky mobs from appearing.

quests.name: Pyromancer's Staff
quests.description: This staff is a real fun one to play with. It can allow you to act like a blaze and shoot fire balls at things.

quests.name: Binder
quests.description: The element binder is used to make several useful items.

quests.name: Iridescent Altar
quests.description: This altar is the top level altar used to craft in Astral Sorcery.

quests.name: Living Stuff
quests.description: Livingrock and Livingwood are some of the basic crafting ingredients needed. In this pack you will need specific stones and logs in order to create them...

quests.name: Slates
quests.description: Making the slates is very important for working with Blood Magic.

quests.name: Blood Altar
quests.description: Starting in Blood Magic requires crafting the blood altar.

quests.name: Terrasteel
quests.description: Terrasteel is made by combining manasteel, manapearl, and a manadiamond together on the terrestrial agglomeration plate.

quests.name: Demon Will
quests.description: Craft a few snares and throw them at you targets. Once you see the particles, you should get some demon will drop from the monster's death.

quests.name: Attunement
quests.description: Attuning yourself and other things will make them a bit better versions of themselves.

quests.name: Inert Crystal
quests.description: In order to start ElementalCraft, you will need to find some inert crystals. The easiest place to find them will either be in the mining dimension, or the Lost Cities.

quests.name: Botanical Machinery
quests.description: These handy machines will greatly simplify automation of the botania crafts.

description: The magic progression is a lot less linear and more of a broad array of this that can be done together.
